# calcite-popover-manager

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                                                                                              | Type      | Default                  |
| ----------- | ------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------ |
| `autoClose` | `auto-close` | Automatically closes any currently open popovers when clicking outside of a popover.                                                                     | `boolean` | `undefined`              |
| `selector`  | `selector`   | CSS Selector to match reference elements for popovers. Reference elements will be identified by this selector in order to open their associated popover. | `string`  | `[${POPOVER_REFERENCE}]` |

## Slots

| Slot | Description                                                                               |
| ---- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|      | A slot for adding elements that reference a 'calcite-popover' by the 'selector' property. |
